c74object.name: crow.lfo
c74object.description: Connect to the crow object to automatically generate CV LFOs on the crow eurorack module.

objarg.name: Output Index
objarg.digest: Hardware output to turn into LFO (default is 1)
objarg.description: This value cannot be changed at runtime. Use one object per output if you want multiple LFOs.

objarg.name: Amplitude
objarg.description: LFO amplitude in volts. Negative values invert the LFO.

objarg.name: Skew
objarg.description: 0 corresponds to Saw, 0.5 to tri, and 1.0 to Ramp

method.name: period
method.description: The word period followed by a float number sets the period of the LFO in seconds.

method.name: amplitude
method.description: The word amplitude followed by a float number sets the amplitude of the LFO in volts.

method.name: skew
method.description: The word skew followed by a float from 0.0 to 1.0 sets the skew of the LFO as a fraction of the period. 0 corresponds to saw, 0.5 to tri, and 1.0 to Ramp.
